quest.name: Back to Old Tricks
journal: By now, Thancred can tell when his friends are up to something.

Thancred suspects Urianger is keeping secrets again, and while there is no doubt your enigmatic comrade would only do so with the best of intentions, the weary bard cannot help but worry. He asks you to follow Urianger while he and Y'shtola continue to learn what they can of the Final Days.
You reach the aetheryte in the central plaza of Bestways Burrow, and spy Urianger heading out to Mare Lamentorum. What could possibly demand his attention outside?

Stepping out from the entrance to Bestways Burrow, you see Urianger making his ascent up and out to Mare Lamentorum. It would be a simple task to catch up with him, but it would perhaps be wiser to follow at a distance and see where he is heading.

※You must follow Urianger to complete this task. Return to the designated location should you become separated.

Urianger comes to an abrupt stop, and it becomes clear he has been aware of your presence for some time. The two of you have a candid conversation about Urianger's many regrets, and his aversion to keeping secrets from you and the other Scions moving forward. He then thanks you for this rare opportunity to speak so openly.
Urianger has a plan to help facilitate more forthright cooperation with the Loporrits, but he will need your help to see it through.
objectives: Search for Urianger at the designated location.
Search for Urianger again at the designated location.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The Final Days will make brave fools of us all.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Did Urianger seem strange to you? More so than usual, I mean.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I know he has a penchant for keeping his own counsel, but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried. Would you go and see if he's all right?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Y'shtola and I will remain here and see what else we can learn about the Final Days. If you hurry, perhaps you can catch up to him.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Better for only one of us to go, in case it's a delicate matter.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Urianger usually puts more effort into concealing his clandestine endeavors. Or perhaps he's simply given up on trying to hide it, knowing we'll find out eventually.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: In any case, that he acts with good intentions is plain. So please, give him the benefit of the doubt.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Urianger appears to be heading towards the entrance to Bestways Burrow...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Urianger ventures off into Mare Lamentorum for reasons unknown. You must tread carefully, else he might sense your presence...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Follow Urianger from a safe distance. The objective will end in failure if you are noticed, or if you fall too far behind.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you fail to complete the objective, you may try again by returning to the designated location.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: In truth, my reason for traveling hither was to effect a plan of mine own. A plan which may pave a way forward for us all.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: "May,“ I say, for there is no guarantee of success. 'Tis the reason I set out alone...that failure, should it come, would be mine to bear alone.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Yet thou standest before me with proffered hand and open heart...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: 'Twould be remiss of me to refuse thy amity, and so I ask─wouldst thou join in mine endeavor?
